techmeme.title: Sources: Italy is having growing doubts about closing a €1.5B deal with Starlink in light of the US pullback from commitments to European security (Bloomberg)
Bolt says Ryan Breslow had been reinstated as CEO with the board's "unanimous approval"; Justin Grooms, interim CEO since last March, will serve as president (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
Amazon announces an "AI-aided dubbing" pilot program on Prime Video, starting with dubbing in English and Latin American Spanish on 12 movies and series (Ian Carlos Campbell/Engadget)
Coinbase revives its ambition to bring security tokens, "crypto assets that represent a traditional security", to the US, amid a relaxed regulatory environment (Jason Shubnell/The Block)
Anthropic quietly removes Biden-era AI policy commitments from its website, including pledges to research AI discrimination and share info on managing AI risks (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
